summary: Adds a race of werewolves turned into vampires at the cusp of adulthood, frozen in youth forever.  Utilize the combined powers of a werewolf and a vampire.
descriptionHtml:
==This mod is no longer supported or up to date.  Use at your own risk.  There are many other great young races out there now, PM me if you\'re having trouble finding them.==

The Icemarked are the twisted remnants of an extinct race of skinwalkers.  Divining their imminent downfall, the mages of this people called upon what magic they still retained to make a pact that would keep their descendents alive forever, trapped in the bodies of young adults.  The result was the Icemarked, terribly powerful individuals who were both vampire and werekind.

Powers:
-Vampire Powers
-Unlimited Werewolf Transformations for short duration (30 sec) or long (3 min) depending on which power is used
-Faster Regeneration in both Werewolf and human forms
-10 ranks in Sneak and Illusion, 5 ranks in Destruction, One Handed, Speech, and Conjuration

Compatibility:
- This mod is compatible with mods that add new hair or eyes to other races
- This mod has standalone body and face models and will work alongside any other body and face mods
- This mod will work with any mod that changes the way feeding affects vampires
- This mod will not be affected by most werewolf mods, except ones that change textures
- This mod works best with armors compatible with the UNP skinny body, but can use any other armor as well

Mods Required:
None, this mod uses its own body and face

Future Versions:
- Make head/body textures seamless
- Add custom texture to werewolf transformation
- Fix any bugs found

Credits:
Skinny DIMONIZED UNP (dimon99) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
Yaksha Race (Hello Santa) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10042 (got the head meshes and textures from this mod)
author: DamienBlair
